problems.problem: Persistent acne, acne scars, dark spots and fine lines — need effective remedies
Uncertainty about safely combining natural ingredients (which combinations to use and which to avoid)
Confusion about building a simple, non-overwhelming skincare routine (avoid using too many products / proper order/timing)
Diet-related skin issues and lack of clear guidance on which foods to cut or add (sugar/refined carbs, coffee, hydration)
Risk of trapping dirt and causing harm when using ice/water treatments due to improper technique
Harmful habits (popping pimples, touching face, sleeping/exercising with makeup) and need for practical behavioral guidance
